verses.name: Deuteronomy 14:1
verses.text: Ye are the children of the Lord your God: ye shall not cut yourselves, nor make any baldness between your eyes for the dead.

verses.name: Deuteronomy 14:2
verses.text: For thou art an holy people unto the Lord thy God, and the Lord hath chosen thee to be a peculiar people unto himself, above all the nations that are upon the earth.

verses.name: Deuteronomy 14:3
verses.text: Thou shalt not eat any abominable thing.

verses.name: Deuteronomy 14:4
verses.text: These are the beasts which ye shall eat: the ox, the sheep, and the goat,
